title: When is the final of The Circle?
text:
Will Tim emerge as The Circle’s champion? (Picture: Channel 4)

Love it or hate it, there’s no denying we can’t stop talking about Channel 4’s The Circle.

The reality show’s second series kicked off at the end of September, and the action from the apartment block has kept us hooked, from the catfishing, through to Jack and Beth sharing a snog, and Tim – well, just being Tim.

All good things must come to an end however, and the final is looming – with a £100,000 prize at stake for the winner.

But just how much more is there to go – and when is the final?

Here’s what you need to know…

When is the final of The Circle?

We don’t have very long to go on the show at all, as the final is set to air this Friday, 18 October, from 10pm.

Emma Willis will as ever be in charge (Picture: Channel 4)

The final runs for an hour and a half, with the winner set to be crowned just before the end of the show.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Emma Willis will of course be hosting as the champion is chosen – and the remaining contestants meet each other for the first time and find out who’s been playing as themselves and who’s been catfishing them all along.

Who is left in The Circle?

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

While there is at least one more blocking still to come – after Woody was given the power to block someone in a face to face elimination – here’s who is still in play.

Of the original participants Georgina, Tom, Woody and James – who is playing as single mum Sammie – are still going strong.

From those who entered during the series Ella is still in the game, as are Beth and Jack – who unbeknown to the others have teamed up and are playing as pensioner Joyce.

Relative newcomer Paddy is also still in play, along with Busayo – playing as a man named Josh – while the show’s newest arrival Jan made her debut over the weekend.

Tim remains favourite to take the series title, with odds of 5/2 on the professor emerging victorious come Friday.

The Circle continues on Monday night on Channel 4 at 10pm.

description: The Circle's second series is coming to an end - but when is the final of the Emma Willis-hosted show?
